about.title: What is a digital square meter?
about.text:
A digital square meter is a financial asset or token whose value is directly tied to the price of one square meter of real estate in major global cities.
As the property project progresses through different construction stages, the tokenâ€™s value changes in line with real estate price fluctuations.

c3.p: Buy and sell digital square meters around the world

c4.p: No need for citizenship to invest in real estate abroad
